metadata.Title: CVE-2012-0801 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
lib/formslib.php in Moodle 2.1.x before 2.1.4 and 2.2.x before 2.2.1 doesnot properly handle multiple instances of a form element, which hasunspecified impact and remote attack vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-0801` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 2.2.2.dfsg-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.2.2.dfsg-2').
